description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Defensive

Note: Space Marines Only. Storm Wardens Relic. Innately Master-Crafted. Can make Guarded Attack as Half Action. +4 AP to Arm and Body. Counts as Prot 55 Forcefield with overload 01. Causes 1d10+4 E Damage to all creatures in melee trange of wielder each round that ignores armour. When successfully Parrying attacker makes Toughness Test with -10 per DoS on Parry or is stunned for 1 Round.
